entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -19.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 07:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -19.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -22.1°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
